item.title: What Is X Where X Is Docker's Image?
item.description: Edit log [2022-07-25 Mon] I was following “What’s A Docker Image Anyway?"Â 1, but found that its content is no longer true, there are new changes to metadata of docker image, so I write this blog to reflect the changes that I observed at the time of writing. docker -v Docker version 20.10.17 build 100c701 I write the following Dockerfile.
